content:
# my.createCanvasContext

2021-05-09 18:43

Create [canvas](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev-old/component_canvas_canvas) context This canvas context works on the `<canvas/>` of the corresponding `canvasId` only.

## Parameters

|     |     |     |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **Property** | **Type** | **Description** |
| canvasId | String | ID defined on the `<canvas/>`. |

## Return Value

`CanvasContext`

## Sample Code

copy

```javascript
//.js
const ctx = my.createCanvasContext('myCanvas')

const grd = ctx.createLinearGradient(30, 10, 120, 10)
grd.addColorStop(0, 'red')
grd.addColorStop(0.16, 'orange')
grd.addColorStop(0.33, 'yellow')
grd.addColorStop(0.5, 'green')
grd.addColorStop(0.66, 'cyan')
grd.addColorStop(0.83, 'blue')
grd.addColorStop(1, 'purple')

// Fill color
ctx.setFillStyle(grd)
ctx.fillRect(10, 10, 150, 80)
ctx.draw()
```
